title: Create and Use Objects
description:
A Car class is provided with fields: brand, year and a method honk().

In main:
1. Create a Car object called 'myCar'
2. Set myCar.brand = "Toyota"
3. Set myCar.year = 2020
4. Call myCar.honk()

Expected output: Toyota goes beep!
